sqlMap.select:
select file_id, file_catalog, file_name, file_new_name, file_path, absolutepath, file_size, file_type, file_time, file_save, operatorid, operatorname, relation_id, group_id, attachment_src_id, attachment_src_cd from at_fileupload
file_Time>=TO_DATE(#fileTimeStart:VARCHAR#, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
file_Time<=TO_DATE(#fileTimeEnd:VARCHAR#, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
file_Size>=#fileSizeStart#
file_Size<=#fileSizeEnd#
operatorname like '%'|| #operatorname# ||'%'
file_Catalog = #fileCatalog#
file_Save = #fileSave#
relation_Id = #relationId#
order by file_time desc,file_id desc

insert into test_attachment_info (ATTACHMENT_INFO_ID, ATTACHMENT_NAME, STORAGE_PATH, SPACE_SIZE, ATTACHMENT_SRC_CD, ATTACHMENT_SRC_ID, ATTACHMENT_STATUS_CD, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, attachment_curr_status) values (SEQ_ABF_SYS.Nextval, #ATTACHMENT_NAME#, #STORAGE_PATH#, #SPACE_SIZE#, #ATTACHMENT_SRC_CD#, #ATTACHMENT_SRC_ID#, '01', sysdate, sysdate, #attachmentStatus#)
sqlMap.select: select ATTACHMENT_NAME, STORAGE_PATH from test_attachment_info where ATTACHMENT_INFO_ID = #ATTACHMENT_INFO_ID# and ATTACHMENT_STATUS_CD='01'

select a.attachment_name, a.storage_path, b.dictname as dictpath from test_attachment_info a , eos_dict_entry b where a.attachment_info_id = #ATTACHMENT_INFO_ID# and a.attachment_status_cd = '01' and b.dicttypeid = 'IMP_FILEDIR_PATH' and a.attachment_src_cd = b.dictid

select ATTACHMENT_INFO_ID, ATTACHMENT_NAME, STORAGE_PATH, SPACE_SIZE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from test_attachment_info t where t.ATTACHMENT_SRC_CD = #ATTACHMENT_SRC_CD# and t.ATTACHMENT_SRC_ID=#ATTACHMENT_SRC_ID# and ATTACHMENT_STATUS_CD='01'
sqlMap.update: update test_attachment_info set ATTACHMENT_STATUS_CD = '02', UPDATE_TIME=sysdate where ATTACHMENT_INFO_ID = #ATTACHMENT_INFO_ID#
update test_attachment_info set ATTACHMENT_STATUS_CD = '02', UPDATE_TIME=sysdate where ATTACHMENT_SRC_ID = #ATTACHMENT_SRC_ID# and ATTACHMENT_SRC_CD = #ATTACHMENT_SRC_CD#
update test_attachment_info set ATTACHMENT_STATUS_CD = '02', UPDATE_TIME=sysdate where ATTACHMENT_SRC_CD = #ATTACHMENT_SRC_CD# and ATTACHMENT_SRC_ID in ($ATTACHMENT_SRC_IDS$)
update test_attachment_info set ATTACHMENT_SRC_ID = #ATTACHMENT_SRC_ID#, ATTACHMENT_SRC_CD = #ATTACHMENT_SRC_CD#, UPDATE_TIME=sysdate where ATTACHMENT_INFO_ID = #ATTACHMENT_INFO_ID#
